tool.name: wrapper_HDF_to_ascii_to_csv.perl

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Input file (MODIS L1B or L2 HDF file) note that the input file must be mapped using any type of cylindrical projection.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Product list e.g.  -p rhos_645,rhos_859,rhos_2130  (do not include spaces)

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Lattitude and Longitude of a point in degrees, [lat,long] e.g.   -l '33.1,124'  for a point having a 'lat,long' of 33.1N/124E.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Square width. e.g. -s 9 for a 9 pixel x 9 pixel square region surrounding the lattitude longitude point specified.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Keyword that will be appended to the end of the filename.

tool.description: Wrapper script to run HDF_ascii_gen_YABI.perl and ascii_to_csv_XE.py on an hdf file.
